title: Truck Engines
description: A sound package of truck engines with 138 sound effects, designed in a realistic style. Great for truck and bus engines.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/truck-engines-preview

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/0o9ekfh5brqw2lu/MSE%20-%20Truck%20Engines.pdf?dl=0


The collection includes sounds for each vehicle:

  • 12 fast and 12 slow acceleration sounds
  • 12 fast and 12 slow deceleration sounds
  • 30 seamless loops of engine rpm sounds at five speeds - idle, low rpm, mid rpm, high and very high rpm
  • 48 transition sounds between speeds
  • 6 start engine and 6 stop engine sounds


A total of 6 trucks in the set. All sounds have been created in a realistic style, using realistic vehicle sounds in the design.


This package is perfect for creating engine sounds for realistic vehicles, including trucks, buses, tractors and other heavy transport vehicles. It can also be used to create futuristic heavy vehicles. Enjoy!


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 138 game-ready sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • 6 trucks in total
  • 5 types of engine rpm - idle, low, medium, high, very high
  • 30 seamless loops of engine rpm sounds in total
  • 24 acceleration sounds, 24 deceleration sounds
  • 48 transition sounds between engine rpm
  • 6 start engine and 6 stop engine sounds
  • perfect for the game genres of simulation, adventure, strategy and more

Â 

Number of Audio Waves: 138

Number of Audio Cues: 138

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 17 minutes 07 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
